msg.msgText: {0} objects can only be altered when the Message Gatewayateway server status is "Running".

msgExplanation.p: The requested action cannot be completed because this action must be performed when the server is in the fully active Running state.

msgUserResponse.p: Wait until Message Gateway is fully initialized and running (and if part of an HA pair is the primary node) and then reinitiate the call. Contact IBM Support if problem persists.
